docs.snippet: A court in London will decide in coming weeks whether Royal Dutch Shell can face trial in the UK over oil spill allegations in Nigeria, a decision some legal experts predict could attract more cases against multinationals in Britain....
docs.lead_paragraph: A court in London will decide in coming weeks whether Royal Dutch Shell can face trial in the UK over oil spill allegations in Nigeria, a decision some legal experts predict could attract more cases against multinationals in Britain.

headline.main: Shell Battles Nigerian Communities in High-Stakes London Lawsuit
headline.print_headline: Shell Battles Nigerian Communities in High-Stakes London Lawsuit

docs.snippet: Sunday marks 1,000 days since Boko Haram extremists abducted nearly 300 Chibok schoolgirls in northeastern Nigeria, shocking the world. Nearly 200 of the schoolgirls remain captive. While some girls have been freed, Nigeria's government has been a...
docs.lead_paragraph: Sunday marks 1,000 days since Boko Haram extremists abducted nearly 300 Chibok schoolgirls in northeastern Nigeria, shocking the world. Nearly 200 of the schoolgirls remain captive. While some girls have been freed, Nigeria's government has been accused of keeping them sequestered and silent. Here are some of the key events surrounding the crisis:

headline.main: Timeline: Nigeria's Kidnapped Chibok Girls, 1,000 Days Later
headline.print_headline: Timeline: Nigeria's Kidnapped Chibok Girls, 1,000 Days Later
